title:
Cost and Power-Consumption Analysis for Power Profile Monitoring in
  Optical Networks
authors: Qiaolun Zhang, Patricia Layec, Annalisa Morea, Massimo Tornatore
abstract:
We quantify and benchmark cost and power consumption of power profile
monitoring (PPM) in opaque and transparent IPoWDM networks, comparing it to
current optical time-domain reflectometer (OTDR) technology. Results show PPM
is preferable even when PPM module adds 80% (50%) cost (power) to one
transponder.
subjects: Computing Research Repository/Networking and Internet Architecture
